00012 FileTypeEditor::FileTypeEditor(QWidget *parent,
00013                                                            File* file,
00014                                                            const QStringList& items /*= QStringList()*/ ):
00015 ListManager(tr("Specified file types"), parent, items), file_(file) {
00016 
00017         Q_ASSERT_X(file_, "FileTypeEditor constructor",
00018                 "Null File-pointer given as parameter");
00019 
00020         view_.setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00021 
00022         restore();
00023 }

00026 }
00027 
00028 void FileTypeEditor::onAdd() {
00029 
00030         QString item = ComboSelector::selectFileType(this);
00031 
00032         // if user wrote an empty string or if clicked cancel
00033         if (item.isEmpty()) {
00034                 return;
00035         }
00036 
00037         model_.appendItem(item);
00038 
00039         // inform that content of the widget has changed
00040         emit contentChanged();
00041         return;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void FileTypeEditor::onEdit() {
00045         // ask the view for the selected index
00046         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00047 
00048         // if index was invalid (nothing was chosen)
00049         if (!index.isValid()) {
00050                 return;
00051         }
00052 
00053         // get the old text that is currently stored in the model
00054         QString oldText = model_.data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00055 
00056         // ask the user to set the new text
00057         QString newText = ComboSelector::selectFileType(this, oldText);
00058 
00059         // if empty string was given or cancel was pressed
00060         if (newText.isEmpty()) {
00061                 return;
00062         }
00063 
00064         // if user changed the text
00065         else if (oldText != newText) {
00066                 model_.replace(index, newText);
00067 
00068                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00069                 emit contentChanged();
00070         }
00071 }
00072 
00073 void FileTypeEditor::apply() {
00074         // get all items from the model
00075         QStringList items = model_.items();
00076 
00077         // remove all previous file types and userFileTypes from the model
00078         file_->clearFileTypes();
00079 
00080         foreach (const QString item, items) {
00081                 
00082                 // if the string was one of the types that is defined in IP-Xact standard
00083                 // then it is added to the fileTypes list.
00084                 if (item == QString("unknown") ||
00085                         item == QString("asmSource") ||
00086                         item == QString("cSource") ||
00087                         item == QString("cppSource") ||
00088                         item == QString("eSource") ||
00089                         item == QString("OVASource") ||
00090                         item == QString("perlSource") ||
00091                         item == QString("pslSource") ||
00092                         item == QString("SVASource") ||
00093                         item == QString("tclSource") ||
00094                         item == QString("veraSource") ||
00095                         item == QString("systemCSource") ||
00096                         item == QString("systemCSource-2.0") ||
00097                         item == QString("systemCSource-2.0.1") ||
00098                         item == QString("systemCSource-2.1") ||
00099                         item == QString("systemCSource-2.2") ||
00100                         item == QString("systemVerilogSource") ||
00101                         item == QString("systemVerilogSource-3.0") ||
00102                         item == QString("systemVerilogSource-3.1") ||
00103                         item == QString("systemVerilogSource-3.1a") ||
00104                         item == QString("verilogSource") ||
00105                         item == QString("verilogSource-95") ||
00106                         item == QString("verilogSource-2001") ||
00107                         item == QString("vhdlSource") ||
00108                         item == QString("vhdlSource-87") ||
00109                         item == QString("vhdlSource-93") ||
00110                         item == QString("swObject") ||
00111                         item == QString("swObjectLibrary") ||
00112                         item == QString("vhdlBinaryLibrary") ||
00113                         item == QString("verilogBinaryLibrary") ||
00114                         item == QString("executableHdl") ||
00115                         item == QString("unelaboratedHdl") ||
00116                         item == QString("SDC")) {
00117 
00118                                 file_->addFileType(item);
00119                 }
00120 
00121                 // if the file type was defined by user then it is added to the 
00122                 // userFileTypes list
00123                 else {
00124                         file_->addUserFileType(item);
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 }
00128 
00129 void FileTypeEditor::restore() {
00130         QStringList fileTypes = file_->getFileTypes();
00131         QStringList userFileTypes = file_->getUserFileTypes();
00132 
00133         model_.setItems(fileTypes);
00134         model_.appendItems(userFileTypes);
00135 }
00136 
00137 bool FileTypeEditor::isValid() const {
00138         
00139         // atleast one file type has to be specified
00140         if (model_.rowCount() <= 0) 
00141                 return false;
00142 
00143         return true;
00144 }
